                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Effective July 1, 2010
Five Bus Routes -- Citywide Service
The City of Tracy now offers five TRACER bus routes, including a new commuter route with morning and afternoon service to
most local schools. It's easy to travel throughout Tracy for school, work, shopping or recreation. This guide includes everything
you need to plan your trip.

How to Use this Guide                                                                                                                                             Fares
The map on the reverse side of this guide shows each of the routes
in a distinct color. All the bus stops are shown as yellow triangles
                                                                                                                                                                  Cash Fare (One Way)
                                                                                                                                                                   Adult  Student                                                                                        Senior(65+)/Disabled/
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         System Map and Bus Schedule
along the route.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ADA/Medicare
                                                                                                                                                                   $1.25  $1.00                                                                                                  $.50
Timepoints (those bus stops highlighted on the schedule)
are shown with a number in a circle. Use these easy steps                                                                                                         ADA Attendant                                                    Child (6 and under with adult)
to plan your trip:
                                                                                                                                                                                    FREE                                             FREE
1.  Use the map to identify the route(s) that connects where
    you are and where you wish to go.                                                                                                                             Day Pass (Unlimited Trips. Single Day)
2.  Find the timepoint on that route which is nearest the bus stop                                                                                                 Adult  Student                                                                                        Senior(65+)/Disabled/
    where you wish to board.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ADA/Medicare
3.  Find the schedule for your route (it is shown in a matching color).                                                                                            $3.00  $2.50                                                                                                  $1.25

4.  Find the same numbered timepoint on the schedule. Read down                                                                                                   10-Ride Ticket or Weekly Pass
    to see what time buses depart from that point.
                                                                                                                                                                    Adult  Student                                                                                       Senior(65+)/Disabled/
5.  If you're boarding at a non-timepoint, use the nearest timepoint                                                                                                                                                                                                        ADA/Medicare
    before your stop to estimate the bus departure time.                                                                                                           $12.50  $10.50                                                                                                $5.00
       For personal trip planning assistance call (209) 831-4BUS (831-4287).

                                                                                                                                                                  Pass Sales
How to Catch the Bus                                                                                                                                              All TRACER passes can be purchased on the bus, using exact cash.
                                                                                                                                                                  Passes can also be purchased, by cash or check, at the following
TRACER bus stops are clearly marked with the                                                                                                                      locations: · Tracy Transit Station, 50 E. Sixth Street
sign shown here. To ensure you catch the bus,                                                                                                                      Ticket hours: Monday - Friday, 8:00 am - 5:00 pm
be at the bus stop a little before the scheduled                                                                                                                              · Tracy Parks and Community Services,
departure time. (Do not stand in the road.) As                                                                                                                     400 East Tenth Street. Alternate Fridays closed.
the bus approaches, signal the driver that you                                                                                                                     Ticket hours: Monday - Friday, 8:00 am - 5:00 pm
wish to board by waving your hand. Once on
board, pay your fare or show your pass to the                                                                                                                     Paratransit
driver, take a seat and enjoy the ride.
                                                                                                                                                                  Curb-to-curb paratransit is available to seniors (65+) and persons
Transferring
                                                                                                                                                                  who, because of their disability or health-related condition, (1) can-
You can transfer between TRACER routes for no
                                                                                                                                                                  not independently board, ride and/or disembark from an accessible
extra charge. Just ask your driver for a transfer
                                                                                                                                                                  fixed route transit bus or (2) cannot get to or from a boarding or
slip when you board. It is good for one hour.
                                                                                                                                                                  disembarking location. All Paratransit customers must be certified
Buse transfers at Tracy Transit Station and West Valley Mall.
                                                                                                                                                                  as eligible by the City of Tracy.
                                                                                                                                                                                For an application or to schedule a ride, contact (209) 831-4BUS.
Service Hours and Days
TRACER Routes A, B and C run Monday through Friday from
                                                                                                                                                                  Regional Bus Service
approximately 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. and Saturday from 9:00 a.m.                                                                                                  San Joaquin Regional Transit District's (SJRTD) Intercity Route 26 and                                                                                                                                                                                          Creating Community in Tracy
to 5:00 p.m. The Commuter Routes D and E run only on weekdays                                                                                                     Hopper Route 90 connects Tracy to Stockton. The service complements
when school is in session. TRACER does not operate on Sundays or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     by Connecting People
                                                                                                                                                                  TRACER service, serves many local businesses along the route and
the following holidays: New Year's Day, Memorial Day, Indepen-                                                                                                    provides connections to Stockton.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         to Places
dence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day.
                                                                                                                                                                                    For information, call 1-800-HOW-TO-RIDE or 209-943-1111,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  or visit www.sanjoaquinrtd.com                                                                                                                                    INFORMATION: (209) 831-4BUS (4287)
The Downtown Transit Center (DTC)
The DTC, at 421 E. Weber Avenue, is Stockton's
downtown public transit hub. Nearly all RTD routes
connect at the DTC, with 20 sheltered, off-street




                                                                                                                                                                       26
bus stops on two passenger boarding platforms,
and additional stops on Channel Street and
Weber Avenue. At the on-site customer service
center (open Monday-Friday 8:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m.),
customers can get system maps and schedules,
